content.body:
> Should Symbol.species continue to be an extension affordance generally?

Remind me in case my memory is bad, but Everyone in TC39 agrees that Symbol.species was a Bad Idea that Should Be Removed If Possible, right?
content.formatted_body:
Should Symbol.species continue to be an extension affordance generally?

Remind me in case my memory is bad, but Everyone in TC39 agrees that Symbol.species was a Bad Idea that Should Be Removed If Possible, right?

content.body: lotta people dislike it in the places it currently gets used - arrays, typed arrays, promises, regexes - but it is much less obviously a bad idea for Map and Set, even though those have no methods which use it
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: lotta people dislike it in the places it currently gets used - arrays, typed arrays, promises, regexes - but it is much less obviously a bad idea for Map and Set, even though those have no methods which use it
